attributes.action: MP voting against constituency majority relating to Brexit to face by-election
attributes.additional_details:
Leave - 17.4 m, Remain 16.1m
Constituencies Leave - 406, Remain 242
MPs Leave 160, remain 486
attributes.background: As there was a majority amongst the electorate for a leave vote, MPs representing constituencies wishing to leave but voting in parliament for remain options including soft brexit and revoking article 50 are no longer representative of those constituents and ought to face a by-election
